detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ERC20 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__50.sol#172-427) has payable functions:
	 - ERC20.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__50.sol#249-251)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
